posts.post_text: April 28, 2020 at 2:48 PM#2presumably the easiest way to do it is to send a remotecommand to the other desk.so set your fader page on your current user/deskfaderpage xthen send the other station a command for the different faderpageremotecommand 192.168.0.x faderpage y
